meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Malaysia.
meanings.sent1: In Malaysia, people use ringgits to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ringgits at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The ringgits in my wallet were having a party, jumping up and down.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million ringgits.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ringgits clinking together was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A sum of money in the currency of Malaysia.
meanings.sent1: He saved up all his ringgits to buy a new phone.
meanings.sent2: The cost of the meal was 50 ringgits.
meanings.sent3: I found a jar filled with ringgits buried in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity was worth more than any amount of ringgits.
meanings.sent5: The ringgits slipped through his fingers like sand, disappearing into the night.
